attributes.action: Make it law that caravans must be towed by specific vehicle classes, be seperately insured / mot'd and the person to be certified. Also restricted to travel between 7 at night and six in the morning. Towing vehicles must be 4 wheel drive and develop 200+bhp
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Caravans are dangerous, cause excess congestion, are an eyesore and cause road wear like a normal car. They need to be
